description: Strengthening democratic institutions, protecting the rule of law, and ensuring executive accountability.
examples: Led House impeachment inquiry and led bicameral democracy hearings.
Championed Protecting Our Democracy Act and extended voting rights protections.

description: Preventing financial exploitation by public officials, especially in emerging digital markets.
examples: Introduced COIN Act to prevent crypto profiteering by public officials.

description: Advocating for environmental protections, climate science funding, and sustainable infrastructure.
examples: Spoke at Tahoe Summit; opposed assaults on California clean air standards.

description: Supporting California farmers and food security in the face of tariffs and federal cuts.

description: Protecting privacy rights by opposing misuse of data and surveillance.
examples: Raised concerns about transfer of Medicaid data to immigration enforcement.

description: Supporting humane immigration policies, including paths to citizenship and legal protections.
examples: Supports U.S. Citizenship Act for Dreamers and farmworkers.

description: Promoting gun reform, labor rights, and fair wages for workers.
examples: Supports assault weapon bans, PRO Act, and minimum wage increases.

description: Addressing housing crisis through affordable housing investment and faster development.
examples: Advocated urgent rebuilding post-fires and affordable housing improvements.

description: Balancing national security with oversight and budget scrutiny.
examples: Called for defense reform, pushed back on NDAA with policy riders.

description: Reforming criminal justice and increasing oversight of surveillance agencies.
examples: Introduced legislation to reform FISA court procedures.

description: Supporting a free and open internet and protecting journalistic integrity.
